title: Thaumaturgy
content:
Thaumaturgy Transmutation Cantrip Gain Advantage on Intimidation and Performance Checks. 10 turns Action

Transmutation Cantrip

Gain Advantage on Intimidation and Performance Checks.

Thaumaturgy is a Transmutation Cantrip in Baldur's Gate 3. It gives the caster a bonus to Intimidation and Performance ability checks.
